de.lukaskoerfer.gradle.debugging

Class DebuggingPlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lukaskoerfer.gradle.debugging.DebuggingPlugin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Plugin<Project>

    public class DebuggingPlugin
extends Object
implements Plugin<Project>
    A Plugin that provides extended debugging functionality.

    Applying this plugin will do the following:

    • Register ExtendedDebugConfiguration methods to add customized debug JVM options on each task that implements JavaForkOptions
    • Register a container for debugging configurations. Each configuration will create a Debug task for each task that implements JavaForkOptions
    • Add a main configuration to the container mentioned above
